question: 紅
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
A <vocabulary>dark red</vocabulary> color isn't your favorite color, it is <reading>Benny</reading>'s (<ja>べに</ja>) favorite color. If you know someone named Benny, it will help.

For the secondary reading, think if you see so much <ja>紅</ja> color (like blood, right?) you know that the person is going to die. You know that there is no cure, aka <reading>cure <ja>ない</ja></reading> (<ja>くれない</ja>). Get it?
